channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China’s ‘Smart’ AI Assistants Echoes Microsoft Recall’s Privacy Flaws
item.description: China’s “screen-aware” AI agents are integrated directly into daily workflows to make assistants significantly more useful, but they raise urgent priv...

item.title: The U.S. Allows Food Additives Banned In Europe — RFK Jr. Is Fixing It
item.description: Why the U.S. still allows banned food additives — and how RFK Jr. plans to reform FDA food safety regulations.

item.title: How Will The New Tariffs Affect The Global Services Market?
item.description: As the uncertainty continues, we anticipate that enterprises will further curtail their discretionary spending.

item.title: Can’t Get Into The ‘Marathon’ Closed Alpha? You’re Not Alone
item.description: Bungie’s Marathon Closed Alpha begins later today, starting at 1 PM ET. But it’s not exactly a celebratory day for everyone.

item.title: How Delivery Organizations Can Gain A CX Advantage With AI
item.description: However sophisticated your AI deployment may be, you still have to get the logistics fundamentals right: You have to deliver on time.

item.title: Simple and painless productivity

item.title: Technical debt and AI slop
item.description: Technical debt is easy to incur. It’s unnecessary added features, undocumented code, support for outmoded interactions and anything that slows down yo...

item.title: Good instincts
item.description: Sometimes, in the absence of data or useful experience, we’re left to act on our instincts. It’s worth noting that other people have instincts as well...

item.title: Work ethic vs discipline
item.description: A solid work ethic drives someone to show up, even when they’d rather not. If there’s work on their desk, they’ll take it on. Discipline, on the other...

item.title: The steps vs. the concept
item.description: If you memorize the steps, you have a direct, simple and fast path to obtain the result. Until the world changes. Even the tiniest shift in the system...
